pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw: After thinking about the Teraranger a bit further, I don’t think we’re currently capable of simulating it in a realistic enough manner with Ignition’s sensor suite: [https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/blueprint/comparison](https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/blueprint/comparison) . The best sensor to simulate a ToF sensor is a Sonar sensor, which has not been migrated yet. I believe we should go with a single beam LIDAR Lite v3 equivalent for now.
content.html: After thinking about the Teraranger a bit further, I don’t think we’re currently capable of simulating it in a realistic enough manner with Ignition’s sensor suite: https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/blueprint/comparison . The best sensor to simulate a ToF sensor is a Sonar sensor, which has not been migrated yet. I believe we should go with a single beam LIDAR Lite v3 equivalent for now.
